unnormalised: Arrey yaar, corporate law mhantlear kitli dokedukhi! Mhojea ixttachye company-k Companies Act-ache Sec 134 pallon kelena mhunn notice ailya. Dekhun dislem ki tankam aple financial statements velar file korunk nasle, ji akhri tarik 30/09/2023 asli. Atam te Adv. Sharma-k gheun tem sarkhem korunk bhonvtat, warna bhari jurmano lagtolo, bhai! He soglle kitlench kathin asa, na?
normalised: Arrey yaar, corporate kaido masta dukhi dita! Mhojea ixttache kampnik Companies Actachea section ek shaa ani chovees palon korunk na mhunn notice ailem. Dislem mhunnlear, tanim aple financial statements thik ritin deadline-a bhitor bhorunk na, ji teesri September don hazar teis asli. Aata tanim Advocate Sharma-k hem soglem sarkhem korunk sangon bhonvtat, warna mottea fines poddttele, bhai! Hem soglem kitlench gunt'guntichem asa, na?
text: Arrey yaar, corporate law mhantlear kitli dokedukhi! Mhojea ixttachye company-k Companies Act-ache Sec 134 pallon kelena mhunn notice ailya. Dekhun dislem ki tankam aple financial statements velar file korunk nasle, ji akhri tarik 30/09/2023 asli. Atam te Adv. Sharma-k gheun tem sarkhem korunk bhonvtat, warna bhari jurmano lagtolo, bhai! He soglle kitlench kathin asa, na?
